    Let's Talk

What is Google Search Console?

Google Search Console is a tool offered by Google that allows you monitor how your website is being used by Google.

What can Google Search Console help you do?

Google Search Console gives you the ability to do a lot of tasks that help with your websites' search engine optimizaition goals.

Submit Your Web Pages Directly To Google

One of the best features in Google Search Console is the ability to directly submit a request to their que so that their system can send a web crawler over to your website to check for new or edited information.

See Which Keywords Your Website Is Popping Up For

Google search console gives you the ablilty to see which keywords and phrases your website is appearing in their results for. On top of that you also get to see how many times, from what device, and in the positionn those keywords have triggered your website to appear for.
